title: meatballs
description: These make a great party snack or a simple supper for kids. They take no time at all to make!
ingredients: 1 tbsp plain flour, plus extra for dusting
salt and freshly ground black pepper
1 clove fresh garlic, crushed to a paste in a pestle and mortar
salt and freshly ground black pepper
hard cheese (such as gruyère, emmental or cheddar), grated
